name: Truck Racing Highland
description:
You like playing racing game, sport cars game, have you ever tried with truck auto one ??
Just play this game of truck auto racing highway, this must be more exciting and relaxing
Rally, racing your truck auto on fantastic snowy environment
Rally, racing your dream your truck auto around nice environment with high speed. More thrilling, excited feeling.
This is very basic of racing , rally game of truck auto
Features:
- Amazing graphics of muscle truck nice fantastic snowy environment
- Simple controls to control and drive your dream truck auto
- Gas, brake buttons to control your racing , rally truck auto
- Automatic gear of your racing , rally truck auto
- Swing your device to control your truck auto steer
- Camera button to change your view of racing, rally truck auto
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0UPhv_k8oIU&feature=youtu.be
